title: Rear Bevel Box Oil Specification

body.body: Use of incorrect bevel box lubricant could result in a malfunction of the final drive unit causing lock-up of the rear wheel leading to loss of motorcycle control and an accident.
The rear bevel box must be filled and topped up with
Fully synthetic 75W/90 hypoid oil that meets specification API Service Level GL5. Triumph Performance fully synthetic hypoid oil is recommended
